member.name: T:MindFusion.Reporting.Wpf.Export.ExcelExporter
member.summary: Exports MindFusion reports to Microsoft Excel Open XML (XLSX) format.

member.summary: Creates an Excel file representing the specified report.

The full path to the XLSX file.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Wpf.Export.ExcelExporter.Export(MindFusion.Reporting.Wpf.Report,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates an Excel file representing the specified report.
member.param: A reference to the report that will be exported.
The stream that will contain the exported report.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Wpf.Export.ExcelExporter.BrushToFill(System.Windows.Media.Brush,System.Windows.Size)
member.summary: Converts the specified Brush to an Excel fill when applied to an area with the specified size.
